name: DESTROY ALL BOATS
description:
Fly in the F4U and DESTROY ALL BOATS!!!

Made during PTBO Game Jam 04 (Feb 2018).

Materials don't display properly on web build. (Doesn't support custom shaders?)

Controls:

W / Up - Pitch down
S / Down - Pitch Up
A / Left - Roll left
D / Right - Roll right
Q/E - Yaw left/right
Shift - Throttle up
Ctrl - Throttle down
LMB / Space - Fire Machinegun
RMB / R - Fire Rocket
Esc - Pause

Mouse also pitches and rolls

Tips: BnZ lyfe
